name: UI Prep Design System 4.0 (Free Demo)
description:
Use this demo to preview and interact with a small portion of the components and styles found in the UI Prep design system. There is a playground with 7 exercises you can try that will give you an idea of how things will work in the full design system.


In this file you'll learn how to

  • Use instances
  • Use auto layout
  • Use variants
  • Swap icons
  • Update color styles
  • Update text styles
  • Update components
